tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE OmicsDataSets (
  dataset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dataset_name VARCHAR(255),
  dataset_description TEXT,
  creation_date DATE,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE omics_data_analysis (
  analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  data_set_id INT NOT NULL,
  analysis_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  analysis_results JSONB,
  FOREIGN KEY (data_set_id) REFERENCES omics_data_sets(data_set_id)
);

CREATE TABLE dataset_metadata (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  dataset_id INT REFERENCES omics_datasets(id),
  category_id INT REFERENCES metadata_categories(id),
  metadata_value TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE omics_data ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    data_set_name VARCHAR(255), 
    data_type VARCHAR(50), 
    data_description TEXT, 
    data_size INT 
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    data_set_id INT, 
    analysis_date DATE, 
    analysis_method VARCHAR(100), 
    analysis_summary TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE sample_metadata (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255),
    study_id INT,
    sample_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES omics_metadata(study_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_metadata (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    sample_id INT,
    experimental_conditions VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES sample_metadata(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    result_summary TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiment_metadata(experiment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_files (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_size BIGINT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);
